scenarios.title: The Startup Sprint
scenarios.description: A 12-week software delivery project for a fast-growing startup. Limited budget, aggressive timeline, and a team that's never worked together before.

scenarios.title: Enterprise Migration
scenarios.description: Lead a 16-week legacy system migration for a large enterprise client. Complex stakeholders, strict compliance requirements, and zero tolerance for downtime.

scenarios.title: Global Product Launch
scenarios.description: Coordinate a 20-week cross-functional product launch across 4 time zones. Every decision affects scope, cost, and three competing executive sponsors.
